name: Au Fil des Vents
description:
Take a few minutes to witness and share the journey of a tiny yet adorable hero, here to overcome the pouring rain falling from up high.

Your spirit can only be delighted with this calm and lovely experience!

Game created for the New Jam

Theme : My fridge is empty / It is constantly raining

Time : 72 hours

Loïc da Silva (AsbelGrants) : Game Design, Level Design & Narrative Design

Lucas Friche (Rosenrips) : Game Design, Level Design & Narrative Design

Elise Malbec (Lili Framboise) : Art & Graphic Design

Horace Ribout (Horace_As_A_Dino) : Unity Development

Théo Verpillat (UnBonJusDeFruits) : Music & Sound Design
